tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_complaints (
    complaint_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255),
    complaint_date DATE,
    complaint_message TEXT,
    resolution_status VARCHAR(50),
    resolution_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE customer_complaints (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    complaint_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    complaint_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    resolution_text TEXT,
    resolution_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE resolution_history (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    complaint_id INT NOT NULL,
    resolution_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    resolution_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    resolved_by VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (complaint_id) REFERENCES customer_complaints(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerComplaints (
    complaint_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    complaint_text TEXT,
    complaint_date DATE,
    resolution_text TEXT,
    resolution_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    customer_email VARCHAR(50),
    customer_phone VARCHAR(20),
    customer_address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ServiceAgents (
    agent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    agent_name VARCHAR(50),
    agent_email VARCHAR(50),
    agent_phone VARCHAR(20),
    agent_department VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Customer_Complaints (
    complaint_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    complaint_description TEXT,
    complaint_date DATE,
    resolution_status TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Complaint_History (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    complaint_id INT,
    resolution_id INT,
    history_description TEXT,
    history_date DATE
);
